Method Detail

refreshContactCapabilities

public ContactsServiceResult refreshContactCapabilities(java.lang.String userId)
                                                 throws JibeServiceException
Refresh the capabilities of the specified user. As a result of this call, a contacts event will be triggered, to notify interested observers about the discovered capabilities.

Refer to:
CapabilitiesUpdateEvent

Parameters:
userId - The identifier for the user (in IMS, this is usually the MSISDN).
Returns:
The service result contains a success code, if the call to the IMS backend executed successfully, otherwise it contains an error code.
Throws:
JibeServiceException

getReferralUrl

public java.lang.String getReferralUrl(java.lang.String userId)
                                throws JibeServiceException
Requests the referral URL for the specified user.

Parameters:
userId - The identifier for the user (in IMS, this is usually the MSISDN).
Returns:
The referral URL as a String
Throws:
JibeServiceException
